title: Tier 1
content: Is pes ec campus tier 1 college??

comments.body: govt is inch close to recognize it as IIT Bangalore
Tier 0 bro,have you not of IIT Bengaluru

The tier system is ambiguous and does not exist in any formal sense. Unofficially, people refer to IITs/NITs/BITS etc as the T1 colleges in India. Now where do people draw the line between T2 and T3? Nobody knows.
IITs do not have tiers , shame on you for even asking this question
Why do u think so? Any reasons.
